title: Don't even know who to ban anymore -.-
body:
Annie, Riven, Nasus, Fiora, Swain, Urgot, Diana, Zed like brah. Whoooooo.

I'm a mid lane main so all the top lane bans are just because those guys always get fed against my top laners and what not.

replies.body:
http://www.lolking.net/champions/

Top bans right now are Sej, Hec, LB, Kat, Irelia, Zed and Nidalee.

Of those, LB is a shit ban, and Zed and nidalee are pretty average bans.

Reasoning, for bronze elo, not many people can actually play LB/Zed/Nidalee with any skill, but Sej, Hec, Kat and irelia don't require as much skill to do well on.
The only champon I personally feel is a legit ban is Zed, and that's not because I think he's OP or anything, just a personal thing, I generally lane badly against Zed.

Hint for being against a Zed in mid lane, Take TP instead of ignite, if your post 6 and below half, make a back, this is worth more then the damage and healing reduction that ignite gives.

Though honestly in bronze, unless Zed counters your entire mid lane pool, his a pretty shit ban cause Zed's at bronze are pretty trash.
I remember you, i just didn't know you name changed.

Half if not all of your bans are utter trash you plebian. 

If you want quality bans; Here are some.. 

Taric
Soraka
Poppy
Quinn (Bite me, Zac) 
Evelynn 
Kayle
Zac 
Kog'Maw
Singed 
Yorick
Kassadin
Karthus
Ezreal
Skarner 
Elise
Heimerdinger
Zyra
Galio
Aatrox
Bard
Brand

These champions are utter top kek and will top kek in your team's kek pants. Ban them everygame. 
(Also remember to pray to our savior and lord, AKG catraven)

Gr8 b8 m8 r8 8/8

Btw I'm on boards nearly everyday, who is this AKG catraven? O.o Never saw the name nek minnit theres a thread about him and his name has been mentioned multiple times

> Btw I'm on boards nearly everyday, who is this AKG catraven? O.o Never saw the name nek minnit theres a thread about him and his name has been mentioned multiple times

Catraven is the light in the darkness, he will save all who follow him.
Sej Diana amumu liss riven. the 5 strongest picks atm. Then there the annoying to fight people like cho and yorick.

I feel there aren't many "OPs" around so there no permabanned champ anymore. Which is nice.

I just go Katarina since I don't trust my midlaner to not feed, then whoever is doing well in my recent games.

I don't feel like all these guys are OP. Maybe some, idk but they're just champs I feel are really ban worthy.

Annie, point and click stun and harass. Impossibly to cs badly on, can set up ganks and roams easily. Point and click stun and or Tibbers is almost impossible to dodge. Very little counterplay. Plus in teamfights, Tibbers+Stun on 3 or more targets is gg.

Riven, beats like, basically 80% of top laners and I don't remember the last time my top laner didn't feed against a Riven. Mobility, Knockup, Strong AA's, Shield, Execute. She has basically everything, and it's not exactly like she's terrible in teamfights. Ultimate outplay champion.

Nasus, no top laner ever understands that he has to be kept down and harassed. And when they do, and the Nasus doesn't get stacks, all the enemy team has to do is find somewhere for Nasus to farm safely and then stall the game out. And then late game, unless I was lucky enough to get a Kog'maw or Vayne, he's unstoppable.

Fiora, some kinda deal with my top laners not being able to deal but except when she ults, there is literally nothing that can be done. Although, she's not SO bad because she's ridiculously useless when behind and if her ult didn't hurt she's just walking trash but I still feel she's ban worthy.

Swain, HOW DO YOU EVEN PLAY AGAINST THIS DICKHOLE.

Urgot, when Urgot hits a target with E, his Q's HURT and have RIDICULOUS range. He's kinda untouchable in lane. Becomes ridiculously tanky, reliable, deals a shittonne of damage to squishies and tanks. Not to mention his ult on the right target can win them the teamfight easily. I've seen an Urgot kill a full health Support Nautilus with three Q's....

Diana, is not as bad as the others I feel... When she gets ahead, she's unstoppable, but when I get the opportunity to counter pick her, I do fine. It's just when she roams, she has great ganking potential, lots of moblity and can get to a oneshotting stage very quickly. Super snowbally.

Zed, is in my opinion the least ban worthy of all of these, it's just a personal ban because he's played often, and I don't lane too well against Zeds. I usually don't ban him because I play him sometimes, and if I'm playing Lissandra (which I do a lot, 2nd most played this season) I'm completely fine and comfortable.
